Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

Convoy placed Rave over his shoulder and offered and arm to Windlord. "Need a 
buddy to lean on?"

Sabre looked back at the Chronos... He felt his last hopes of finding his 
sister sliding away through his fingers... "Why did the ship breack up... why 
did the rift rip their ship apart, what happened to his sister...?" He turned 
and followed the others...

--part1_47.2d6eb9d9.2be36d6e_boundary
